name: Blood Elemental
description: The Blood Elemental is a large, liquid-like entity with a strong connection to blood and vitality. It can manipulate its form to slip through narrow spaces, engaging enemies in close combat.
memorable: Its ability to grapple and drain the life force from adventurers makes it a dangerous foe, especially when it can grow in size after dealing substantial necrotic damage.
goals: To drain the life force of opposing creatures and control the battlefield
relations: Related to other elemental creatures, could be summoned by practitioners of blood magic
environment: Often found in dark and damp areas, such as caves or near bodies of water
strengths: High durability and the ability to control movement; capable of grappling multiple opponents.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to poison damage and is destroyed instantly if fully submerged in water.
attacks: Utilizes slam attacks for bludgeoning damage and has a powerful blood drain attack that deals necrotic damage and grapples foes.
most_powerful_ability: Blood Drain allows it to inflict damage and restrain enemies, posing a serious threat, especially in groups.
additional_information: When it deals 30 or more necrotic damage in one hit, it grows in size.
The Blood Elemental is immune to necrotic and psychic damage.
It can pass through spaces as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing.
It can grapple Large or up to two Medium creatures simultaneously.
It has a high Constitution score, enhancing its hit points.
